price: ߞߏ߫ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߣߌ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
